content.title: Add Search Widget to the FlexContainer
content.body:
1. From the Project explorer, expand Mobile > Forms > frmFlexlayout, and select flxHeader.
  2. From the Default Library tab on the bottom left of your canvas, search for Search1 widget.
  3. Drag and drop the Search1 widget onto the frmFlexLayout form on your canvas.
  4. From the Properties panel, expand Look > Flex from the top right of your canvas. Change the Width property to 50%
